Posts.Content: May 23, 2015 01:18PM Sabel wrote: I'm not Stage IV yet, but even when I'm three years out from dx and px, I still have my BFF who's as healthy as a horse and proud of it. She is always active and just doesn't understand my limitations right now. She and her husband returned after a month in Mexico, only to book an Alaskan cruise for yet another week. Her husband is a great guy who's been having a hard time with Fibro. If he doesn't travel with her, she'll go with another friend leaving him at home with a long list of to-do's. Whenever she and I speak, she tells me about all the things she's working on. Without being rude, how do I tell her to back off?
